scripts.db: npm run db:stop && npm run db:start & npm run schema
scripts.db:start: cd dev/database && docker-compose run --rm --name postgres_dictionary -p 5432:5432 db
scripts.db:stop: (docker stop postgres_dictionary || true) && (docker wait postgres_dictionary || true) && (docker rm postgres_dictionary || true)
scripts.schema: sleep 5 && wait-on tcp:5432 && sleep 2 && wait-on tcp:5432 && cd dev/database && node createSchema.js
scripts.scottishDb: npm run scottishDb:stop && npm run scottishDb:start & npm run scottishDb:schema
scripts.scottishDb:start: cd dev/scottishDatabase && docker-compose run --rm --name postgres_scottish -p 5555:5432 db
scripts.scottishDb:stop: (docker stop postgres_scottish || true) && (docker wait postgres_scottish || true) && (docker rm postgres_scottish || true)
scripts.scottishDb:schema: sleep 5 && wait-on tcp:5555 && sleep 2 && wait-on tcp:5555 && cd dev/scottishDatabase && node createSchema.js
